review: The Firestick makes your TV almost like a Smart TV. I am very happy with the one time I've used it. My wife has since taken over and is watching her shows. And she loves it, too!
author: Tom Quicksell

review: One of the greatest, most economical, tech inventions ever.  No more paying $100+ to a cable or satellite company.  With this gizmo, you can continue to watch all of your favorite shows, at your convenience for as little as $3.66/month.
author: Dane Dobrinska

review: This is a great low cost smart TV option.
author: fjn3

review: i wanted to get one of these today for Prime day...but amazon falsely gave the impression that i could get one for $25...but those are all gone and if you want one you can get it at the regular price...so...i will buy one for the regular price..but NOT on amazon. will buy it on Bestbuy just because Prime Day sucks!!!

review: Seems like this would be nice, but it's tough for those of us on the West Coast, since the Prime deal is sold out by the time we can get to it.
